string-array.name: info_des
string-array.item: This App is called SP Share.
This App is made by Roy and Fabian.
This App is dedicated to SP Students as well as Mr Tan.
This App took way longer than we liked to admit.The amount of blood we shed...
Click on "share notes" to upload your note and be a kind soul, click on "view notes" to do your last minute revision.
We wanted to build a relatively easy App but also in depth and useful to SP Students.
